channel.title: Sudoku on Bluish capsule
channel.description: Recent content in Sudoku on Bluish capsule

item.title: Combinations with sum
item.description: To find all the possible combination for a given sector in a killer sudoku or in a “between 1 and 9” sudoku. Find all combinations for a between 1 and 9 that sums to 18 with 3 cells from itertools import combinations print [c for c in combinations([2,3,4,5,6,7,8], 3) if sum(c) == 18] Find all combinations in a killer for a sum of 22 in 3 cells from itertools import combinations print [c for c in combinations([1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9], 3) if sum(c) == 22]
